thread.title: Citigroup Shares Jump Nearly 4% After Investor ValueAct Reveals Stake - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Telis Demos
title: Citigroup Shares Jump Nearly 4% After Investor ValueAct Reveals Stake - MoneyBeat - WSJ

organizations.name: nra convention pull focus to school

text:
shares are up 3.7%, on track for their best one-day jump since 2016, after activist investor ValueAct Capital Partners LP announced it has built a roughly $1.2 billion stake in the bank. That’s a bigger price jump than when ValueAct last made a major bet on a bank, . That stock jumped 2% the next […]
